dataHome.subtitle: Web Developer | Visual Design
dataHome.description: I'm Creative designer based in Brasil, and i'm very passionate and dedicated to my work

sobre.title: About Me
sobre.subtitle: My Presentation
sobre.descricao: Frontend developer in the city of São Paulo, I create web pages with UI/UX user interface, I am currently studying Systems Analysis and Development - IFSP, seeking to improve both my “soft skills” and “hard skills”.

translation.__comment-Projects: Past Skills - Projectsitem.jsx e Data.jsx - Projects Obs: Poderias usar o ID mas estou saudno o title deles para facilitar a leitura

BiCity.title: BiCity
BiCity.description: BiCity application for cyclists in São Paulo, offering collective evaluation of the city's bike lanes and centralization of cycling-related events - IFSP 2025.

CFB jQuery.title: CFB jQuery
CFB jQuery.description: Project focused on learning jQuery, creating interactive web interfaces with dynamic element manipulation - CFB Cursos in 2025.

Animais Fantasticos.title: Fantastic Animals
Animais Fantasticos.description: Focused on web learning, displays information about animals, dynamic and responsive interface with animations - Origamid in 2025.

JavaScript ES6+.title: JavaScript ES6+
JavaScript ES6+.description: Focused on learning JavaScript ES6+, exploring modern concepts such as arrow functions, destructuring, modules, and async/await - Origamid in 2025.

Análise de dados COVID-19.title: COVID-19 Data Analysis
Análise de dados COVID-19.description: A data analysis on the impact of vaccination on reducing COVID-19 cases and deaths, to explore trends and patterns - IFSP in 2025.

Cadastro de Produtos.title: Product Registration
Cadastro de Produtos.description: CRUD system for product registration, allowing creation, viewing, updating, and deletion of products in a database - IFSP in 2024.

RESTAPI.title: REST API
RESTAPI.description: API to provide endpoints that enable integration and data manipulation in web applications - Origamid in 2024.

Handel.title: Handel
Handel.description: WordPress site for an online store, with plugin integration and advanced styling - Origamid in 2024.

Solar Calculator.title: Solar Calculator
Solar Calculator.description: A solar calculator designed to estimate solar energy generation based on specific parameters, offering a simple and functional interface, APK available in the links - IFSP in 2024.

Bikcraft.title: Bikcraft
Bikcraft.description: WordPress site for a bicycle shop, with customized plugins, responsive design, and dynamic content management - Origamid in 2024.

ingressoja.title: Ticket
ingressoja.description: Event website where users can choose a movie, play, or lecture of their preference - IFSP in 2023.

ComenteSobre.title: CommentAbout
ComenteSobre.description: Web system that allows users to comment on specific topics similar to a forum - IFSP in 2023.

BusinessIA-PI.title: BusinessIA-PI
BusinessIA-PI.description: Objective is to create a specialized website to meet the needs of Business.IA, Artificial Intelligence and Data Analysis, aligned with Marketing Strategies - IFSP in 2023.

Ativa Investimentos.title: Activate Investments
Ativa Investimentos.description: Used Vue.js and CSS to enhance my skills, developing a clone of the Ativa Investimentos company page for study purposes - in 2023.

Calendário SUS.title: SUS Calendar
Calendário SUS.description: Project challenge was to develop a calendar to assist patients through SUS with an online schedule - Senac in 2022.

Redes Sociais.title: Social media
Redes Sociais.description: Social media portfolio before the existence of tools like Linktree and ChatGPT, filling a gap that these tools currently occupy - Senac in 2022.

Currículo Web.title: Web CV
Currículo Web.description: I developed my first comprehensive project to consolidate my knowledge acquired so far in 2022 - Senac.
